entering.#cdata-section:
Check the status of out of service elevators ELEVATOR ALERTS

The train platforms at Colma Station are located one level below the street. Concourse is on the street level.

Only one elevator is needed to get from the street to the train platform.

The elevator is located inside the paid area. Press "P" for train platform level.

At the train platform level, you will be approximately at the center of the train boarding area. East Bay bound trains to your right and San Francisco Airport (SFO), Millbrae bound trains to your left.

exiting.#cdata-section:
The train platform at Colma Station are located one level below the street.

Only one elevator is needed to get from train platform to street.

Exiting from either San Francisco Airport (SFO), Millbrae, Dublin/Pleasanton, Warm Springs/South Fremont bound trains or Pittsburg/Bay Point, Richmond bound trains, you will be approximately at the center of the platform. Press "S" for street level.

When exiting the elevator, you will be inside the paid area.

parking.#cdata-section:
Parking at Colma Station includes:

  • Daily fee ($3 per day)
  • Scoop to BART Carpool Program
  • Carpool Permit Program
  • Single Day Reserved Permit
  • Monthly Reserved Permit
  • Airport/Long Term Permit
  • Extended Weekend

Check out the parking section for details about each program.

Map of parking locations

lockers.#cdata-section: 24 keyed lockers are located at this station. Call Customer Services at 510-464-7133 to ask about availability of keyed bicycle lockers. Many stations have a wait list. Download an application form for keyed bicycle lockers.

transit_info.#cdata-section:
Colma Station is served by Samtrans.
